column5: Is the ice out on Sturgeon Lake and Savant Lake,going up May 17 2002

Is the lake you are talking about called Sturgeon Lake or Black Sturgeon Lake? We fish Black Sturgeon and I have heard about the ice conditions there. Let me know which lake and i will give you the 411.SchmegMay the fish be big and the babes plentiful
Should be out, but I would check with the lodge to be sure.The Woods and Seul are going good now with bays and current areasopen.Just Fish
The lake is just called Sturgeon Lake,NE.of Sioux Lookout.
